tool_description: This API retrieves all date, time and state based on all area codes in North America
name: Area Code Date Time
title: Area Code Date Time

api_list.name: GetAllInfo
api_list.description: This Endpoint requires no parameters and will simply return a collection object with *current* date, time, state and time zone for each state in the USA.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://area-code-date-time.p.rapidapi.com/api/timezone/USA/all-info"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "area-code-date-time.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://area-code-date-time.p.rapidapi.com/api/timezone/USA/all-info"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "area-code-date-time.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
